bug.author: matthew-z
bug.summary: The num of batches produced by a dataloader is wrong when num_workers > 0
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
The num of batches produced by a dataloader is wrong when num_workers > 0 <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Colab: <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1keblQN7GL_R9r1T6_82zU2AMP-4hjnJX>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1keblQN7GL_R9r1T6_82zU2AMP-4hjnJX</denchmark-link>
As the batch_size =1, the dataloader should produce 100 batches. However, it produced num_workers * 100 batches.
